page.title: 11AUSTERFIELD GOLF CLUB
page.content: Austerfield Golf Club is situated 1 mile to the east of the A614{on a {disused sand and gravel works.}Its{181 {acres}consists of an{18 hole}course, a {driving range,}a club house with a bar and restaurant.The club is owned by four elderly gentlemen directors who employ 16 people,6 full time and 10 part time two of the full time employees are the greenkeeper and his assitant and their job is to cut the greens and driving range,clear all the litter and generally keep the whole place running smoothly.This job takes 5 days a week every week of the year. The club has roughly{450 members}25% of which play every week.
